# The `VPBaseLoadStoreSDNode` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This base class is used to represent VP&#95;LOAD, VP&#95;STORE, EXPERIMENTAL&#95;VP&#95;STRIDED&#95;LOAD and EXPERIMENTAL&#95;VP&#95;STRIDED&#95;STORE nodes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This base class is used to represent VP&#95;LOAD, VP&#95;STORE, EXPERIMENTAL&#95;VP&#95;STRIDED&#95;LOAD and EXPERIMENTAL&#95;VP&#95;STRIDED&#95;STORE nodes.
